import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import toast from "react-hot-toast"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const JoinCricket = () => { const [team, setTeam] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { setteam(); }) const setteam = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:5050/user/getTeam") setTeam(res.data) } catch (err) { toast.error("error in join team", err) } } return (<>
{team && team.map((value, index) => ( <> { value.games === "cricket" && ( ) } ))}
Sr No. Team name Rank Run Rate
#{index + 1}
{" "}

{value.teamName}

Rating{" "} ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
{index + 1} {" "} Out of 312
12.5
) } export default JoinCricket
